revised_title: The Lyncurium of the Ancients: A Study on the Tourmaline Stone
tldr: The author investigates the Lyncurium of the ancients and concludes that the Tourmaline stone best fits the description provided by Theophrastus. The Tourmaline exhibits hard, pellucid properties, a deep-red color, and the ability to attract and engrave seals, supporting its identification as the Lyncurium.
